title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1208/97 of 27 June 1997 fixing for the 1997/1998 marketing year the amount of the levy in connection with the offsetting of storage costs for sugar
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1208/97 of 27 June 1997 fixing for the 1997/1998 marketing year the amount of the levy in connection with the offsetting of storage costs for sugar
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1997/1998 marketing year, the amount of the levy referred to under the second subparagraph of Article 8 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1785/81 is hereby fixed at ECU 2,00 per 100 kilograms of white sugar.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 June 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
